title: Where can I find free copyright music besides the YouTube audio library? - Quora

response.answer_text: My songwriting partner and I put more than 30 free-to-use tracks up on SoundCloud in the last two weeks, because there were so many posts on Quora about YouTube copyright troubles. Just search SoundCloud for XOR Music. The songs are offered under the least restrictive Creative Commons license, attribution only. We'll add more if people use these.
Search bicube in youtube , not posting link cause last time quora deleted my answer thinking spam, I use music from bicube for my unboxing videos
